description:
What do you like when you mix fucking and feet? Four devilishly sexy female gangsters capture a known foot fetishist and tease and torture him with their feet in an abandon warehouse. Alan Stafford is made to lick, sniff, suck, clean and worship all 40 of their delicious toes, heels and arches. Each girl has a different pair of sweet sweaty socks for him to devour as well as open toe heels, closed toe heels and sky high sexy suede boots! Don't miss each girls orgasmic reaction through their toes as they each take a ride on this lucky foot freak!
A nod to Quentin Tarantino one of my favorite directors and foot fetishists!
title: Reservoir Paws: 8 Feet and 40 Toes
